review: Very helpful and caring dentist, explained and treated the problems that I am facing well and she also educated me on how to prevent them from happening again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When we visit a doctor, we except them to be a bit friendly with us and understand us about what is wrong with our body. 
When i met Dr. Dimple, she turned out to he exactly i what i wanted my dentist to be. She is a very happy and friendly doctor and moreover, a good guide when it comes to her patients.
She was like a mom in the room explaining me about my teeth and the problems i can go through if I don‚Äôt take them seriously, and correcting me where ever i was wrong.
A satisfied patient to a wonderful doctor, thank you doctor arora. ü§ó‚ò∫Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Cavities,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Bleeding Gums,Dental Fillings,
review: It all started in October 2019 with lots of sensitivity in my teeth and also a headache. But it was Dr Dimple Arora, who was so commendable in detecting the root issue and I am glad that I followed your advice and got my self braces even at the age of 30; I was hesitant  for a while in deciding though, but I am glad I did. It not only had an aesthetic but also cured all my sensitivity  and headache problem and can't appreciate much for your thorough professional work with a very friendly and assuring touch of yours. Honestly speaking you are actually and  only the one dentist specialists on whom I can blindly trust on. your humbleness in treating me actually like your own little daughter is really commendable. A large thank to you as ou have solved all my teeth problems so seamlessly so now it is that I feel that people do not keep praising you just like that.An ideal dentist for me for the method with which you actually cured my tooth issues so early as well as so perfectly, without a single root canal, I feel others may not be able to do the same.Thankfulness is all I want to express to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doc is really awesome! She explained everything really well. Although I had to wait an hour because of emergency service but she did take a look before asking me to wait/come back later. Even did a follow up about a suspension I had. Will refer and revisit!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Teeth Whitening,RCT - Single Sitting,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Dr.Dimple diagnosed **** ********* ***** ** ** *** ***** She took a digital x-ray and explained  that my tooth had deep cavity. She did root canal and i got immediate relief from pain.  Then the doctor did teeth whitening for me and I got good results. *** ** *** **** ******* *** ***

This is a great place to go take care of your teeth. The doctor was very professional examining and providing with solutions by priority. I had to do periodontal root cleaning and Dr. Dimple Arora did a great job, I felt that I was in good hands. She was very gentle and kind to me. She explained very well what was going on. Thanks to Dr. Dimple Arora

Like the facility, would say not one of the most friendly doctors. But he is good. Because of the covid scare all discussion was were not done face to face. So created a bit confusion. Would have liked a call from doctor to explain  everything After the whatsapp prescription right away, cause for the doctor its a routine, not for us, but anyhow we spoke in the end and got clarity. A patient would like promptness. Not 2-3 hours later.
reply_text: Things have changed in dentistry due to COVID pandemic.We are following strict guidlines given by Indian Dental Association to practice in this scenario.This is for yours as well as our safety. We are devoting too much time in sanitization and sterilization protocols and making arrangements for the patients for emergency treatments.Thats why we could not respond immediately.

review: First time i hv visited at her clinic 15yrs bck ...i hv gone for braces but she suggested me dnt go for braces otherwise u hv to suffer in future bcz ur toungue is large enough....she always give right suggestion ....for her money doesn't matter customer satisfaction matter....i hv send many patients there and all appreciate doctor
reply_text: THANK YOU SHIVANI FOR THE FEEDBACK

review: My teeth were  very yellow  and there were gaps between my teeth, so I visited Dr.Dimple who is cosmetic dentist. She did teeth  whitening for me with ZOOM system .  Then my gaps were closed by cosmetic material. Results were very good . Will recommend my friends to Dr.Dimple .Thank you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Arora's clinic after seeing all the positive reviews on practice and I am glad that I did. When I reached the clinic, I was really scared as I used to think that dental procedures are bound to be painful but trust me, Dr. Dimple treats you with utmost care and patience that all your worries fade away. Infact, just after the treatment I went and operated a flight as there was no pain or discomfort at all. I highly recommend Dr. Arora's clinic to everyone going through any dental discomfort.
Very helpful and caring dentist, explained and treated the problems that I am facing well and she also educated me on how to prevent them from happening again.

I booked an appointment with Dr. Arora for my mother (Alka Madan) as she was experiencing severe pain in one of her teeths. After meeting the doctor we found that her teeth were in very bad condition and now thanks to one root canal and teeth cleaning my mother is feeling really good and is super happy with the the way the doctor has handled her case. The doctor is very soft spoken and is really transparent, my mother is now her life long patient. 100% recommended :)
reply_text: THANK YOU FOR THE FEEDBACK AND TRUSTING

review: I got my teeth straightened by braces. The doctor is well experienced and explains the treatment process well. After braces treatment I got my teeth whitened by Zoom technology . I am very happy and satisfied with my dental treatment. Thank you doctor  for the gud work.

My daughter age 12 yrs had crowded teeth and smile eas not that gud. I got her braces treatment done at Arora's Dental Clinic  at Ashok Vihar .Its been a year and I am very happy with the treatment. Thank you doctors for doing perfect job.Keep it up.God bless.

Dr.Dimple is experienced , knowledgable. My front tooth had become dark yellow. Dr did RCT  which was painless . Then she whitened my teeth  with Zoom  whitening system. After that shs gave a ceramic crown on RCT tooth. Now I have a bright smile for which I am thankful to Dr.Dimple.

Dr.Dimple is very polite and handles kids very well. I had shown my daughter to other dentist but she  got scared , so I brought her  to Dr.Dimple . She had cavities and I got them filled .Thanx doctor for treating and managing my daughters dental problem.

My son had crooked  teeth ...they were not straight...My friends had got treatment done at Arora's Dental Clinic and they recommended me ...I showed my son to Dr.Dimple ....I was convinced with the plan of treatment with braces.  Treatment is going on and I am  very satisfied.

My wisdom tooth used to create problem and pain. I visited Arora's Dental Clinic .Dr.Dimple took an x-ray and adviced its extraction. She removed it ...it was almost painless. I also got my fillings done. I am happy with the treatment done by Dr.Dimple.

Dr.Dimple is very polite , dedicated doctor. Good hand. I had cavities and got it filled with tooth colored fillings. You cant make out.  The doctor is very confident and gave me guaranteed treatment and said that my fillings will never come out. Good job .Thank you Dr.

My lower jaw front teeth were worn down and were paining .Dr.Dimple Arora  did RCT which was painless . Now I am not scared of dental treatment. Good work done by Dr.Dimple. Doctor has made 4 crowns  and  the gaps are closed now.I am happy with my smile now.
********* ******* explained problem very well and suggested all possible procedures. Very polite and helpful
My Experience was way above my expectation‚Ä¶Dr Dimple Attended me on time & carefully listen my problem which is am Going through‚Ä¶and Suggested way forward..Many Thanks

Doctor is very professional and has good work. Fees is reasonable too.I am satisfied. I will recommend to others.

I had yellow teeth.I visited many dentists, but couldnt get a bright smile. At Arora's Dental Clinic I got teeth whitening done and capping .Results were amazing.I am fully satisfied with my whiter smile now. Thanx doc.
Dr.Aman Arora is senior experienced dentist  Specialist in fixed teeth and cosmetic dentist.He did RCT in single sitting.Then he put 3 crowns .I am very satisfied with the treatment.
Dr. saved my tooth by root canal treatment  and capping. Treatment was  comfortable  and reaasonable too. It was worth.
Dr.Dimple is well experienced dentist  with good knowledge and good work. She did few teeth extractions of my father. We are totally satisfied.

Dr.Dimple is very understanding.She did my treatment in 2 visits,no waiting,no time waste.cleaning and whitening was done and am very happy with the final result.gained my confidence.Good treatment she did.EXCELLENT DOCS and staff.
Doc is too good and for the first time in my life I have seen a dentist doing a comfortable and painless treatment.
The experience was great. The clinic is hygienic and the doctors took good care in explaining the problem and their treatment was satisfactory. Highly Recommended!
dr is very friendly and polite.showed me my cavitys and filled them.my senitive teeth have become strong,now i can eat anything.filling was tooth alike.
The doctor is experienced and does RCT very well. She explains well all the steps. Capping is done now.I am very satisfied with the treatment.
i got my tooth removed and bridge which was painless and comfortable.My new teeth are better in looks and eating than my original ones.thank u doc
She has a very soft hand,injection was without pain,very nicely my roots were removed.After treatment also no pain .very good.
Dr Dimple Arora did my cleaning and zoom whitening and in one and a half hour my teeth were white and brighter.I am happy to get my makeover.

My teeth were sensitive and  food used to get stuck in my teeth and cause pain. Dr.Dimple did gum treatment by scaling .My one tooth was cracked and I got it removed. Dr.Dimple did treatment very nicely. I am satisfied.

My son was having lot of pain in gums, so I took appointment from Dr.Dimple .She is very polite and handles children well....She took my son into confidence and did dental treatment. I am very satisfied with the Doctor. Thanx

My daughter  6 yrs old had few cavities . I visited Dr.Dimple at Arora's Dental Clinic. My daughter was very comfortable and got friendly  with the doctor.  Dr.Dimple did the fillings. I am very satisfied with the treatment .

My daughter age 5 years had blackish front teeth., so I visited  Dr.Dimple .  They were cavities. Dr explained well the importance of milk teeth.In single sitting ,fillings were done. My daughter co operated well with the doctor. I am relieved now. Thankk you Dr.Dimple.

Dr.Dimple is very concerned doctor. Has visited her for teeth sensitivity and bleeding gums. She explained my well my dental problems.  My cavities were filled  and gum treatment was done.  I am satisfied with the treatment .Doctor is surely recommended.

I wanted a brighter and whiter smile but cud never get to my expectations  .I visited Arora's Dental Clinic  .They specialize in cosmetic dentistry. Got my teeth whitening ...was simply amazing. Gud results. Mextremely satisfied. Got few cosmetic fillings done. Perfect job. Thanx Doc.

Visited Dr,Dimple for my 6 yr old son  who had cavities.She explained me well about importance of milk teeth abt which i was not aware.   Few fillings were done . My son was very comfortable. Will surely recommend children to Dr.Dimple for dental check ups and treatment.

My teeth were yellowish. I visited Dr.Dimple  .She suggested teeth whitening . The clinic has Zoom teeth  whitening system. I had read about it.Its one of the best . I experienced amazing results after Dr did teeth whitening for me. One sitting procedure. Very comfortable.I m very happy and satisfied.

My son age 9 years had milk teeth which didnt break. Permanent teeth were not coming correctly. Xray was taken and doctor explained me in detal. Dr.Dimple handled my son well and milk teeth were removed  after giving anaesthesia.  The treatment was comfortable for my son. We both are satisfied.
Good.., he is our family doctor since he started his practice. We highly recommend him to everyone .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent service. Shall prefer to take appointment, whenever required in future, at Arora's Clinic.

Doctor is pretty & very sweet.I have come from U.S. when dentist adv me rct & caps 4 all teeth of my 4yrs daughter under GA.She very nicely explained & comforted us.Im IMPRESSED.In 2 visits only all cavities were filled.My daughter Aashriya is very happy & FRIENDLY with her.What a remarkable work.

I was having severe pain  and I took appointment with Dr.Dimple . She found out that  my back tooth was deeply destroyed. She explained me the treatment procedure clearly and did RCT of the tooth. Next day onwards my pain vanished.  She did ceramic capping on the tooth. I am  very comfortable now. Gud job Doctor.

I had pain when I used to chew and food used to get stuck in my teeth. So I consulted Dr.Dimple .She took a digital X-ray and showed me few cavities . She did fillings  which will last lifetime  and no one can make out as it matches with the tooth. One tooth needed root canal  for which anaesthesia was given which was almost painless. After RCT she gave me a ceramic crown. I am very happy with the doctors work.

I had severe tooth pain and was prolonging my dental treatment since long.   Dr.Dimple took an X-ray and explained that my tooth was destroyed too much and adviced me removal of the tooth.I was afraid of pain. She gave me anaesthesia which didnt pain at all. After about 5 minutes she pulled out my destroyed tooth slowly . Thanks to doctor ..it was painless.

I had lot of cavities and was not able to chew properly and and pain often. Dr.Dimple did a dental check up  and took x-ray and adviced root canal of one tooth and few fillings.  My treatment went of well and now I am very comfortable. Thank you Dr.Dimple.

Dr.Dimple know a lot about smile designing. My teeth were yellow  and I wanted  whiter teeth as I am a social person by profession. She cleaned  and polished my teeth .After that I  underwent a Teeth Whitening sesion by Zoom System. This ZOOM gives  unbelievable results  . I had got teeth whitening earlier somewhere  but here I got perfect result as I wanted. Thank u Doctor .
